title: Missing You: A Friends to Lovers Romance
description: Zach and Elena.Elena and Zach.We had been best friends since we were eight when she moved in next door. She's an amazing gal and I'm lucky to be her number one friend. But I made a mistake. I kissed her one night and it was the best, sweetest kiss I had ever had. And now I don't know what to do.Will Elena really like me back the same way?A sweet, friends-to-lovers romance with its million obstacles and guaranteed happy ending!Can be read as a standalone or after Book One (Desiring You).
author: Iris Taylor
